Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

"Very well then, your entitled to that" Megatron strained. "As you probably
know, I was turned into Galvatron in the year 2005, and then spent months
on a planet that used to exist called Thrull. I soaked in a plasma bath, or
I should say Galvatron did, and it damaged his circuits, that's when all
that was me died. I then was able to watch him destroy everything I
created, the Decepticon empire, the vast territorial gains in the galaxies,
and my reputation, and I was powerless to stop him. But now, the idiot
revived me, for who knows what reason" Megatron stated, then closed his
eyes, expecting to die at the hands of another surge of pain from his
master. But it never came.

He adressed Autofire again, "I came here because I sensed a source of
energon being burnt, I was hoping to find a generator, or something, but it
was you, which could be much more profitable to both of us". He then
checked his energon readings, " I am weak now because I plotted against
Galvatron, but little did I know he had control over me. He flooded my
circuits with raw energon to destroy me. But I survived, just like I will
survive this encounter Autofire, it dosent matter what you do. I was built
to not only be the Decepticon leader, but a survivor as well. I was ancient
when your designs where first thought up. I have survived for over 16
million years, and will continue to. This time nothing shall stop me, and
my dream of conquest. You Autofire, are a Mercencary, but little do you
know, you are born to rule this Universe, by birthright. All other
creatures are inferior to you Autofire, and you could be a soldier today,
to lead the Decepticon empire into the futur" he finished.
